channel.title: Posts on HirschDaniel
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on HirschDaniel

item.title: Hugo Cheat Sheet
item.description: Here’s a list of useful hugo commands I regularly use. # Build your hugo project hugo # Create a new content file hugo new <path> # Run the hugo development server hugo server Remember to set draft = false for content to be displayed.

item.title: I decided Wordpress is for freaks and dumped it
item.description: I’ve been publishing wordpress websites for well over 10 years now. Wordpress was working well for me once I was familiar and knew a set of plugins to use. I knew exactly which caching, security, image compression, host, etc. to install to get things running smoothly. Somehow, this still doesn’t feel simple enough. No way every website is built like this. Back in school, I learned that a website is just HTML (for content) and CSS (for styling).
